meta.label: Retrieve LinkedIn campaigns
meta.description: Pull campaign groups, campaigns, creatives, campaign analytics and creative analytrics from the LinkedIn API

outputRoles.name: campaign_group_dataset
outputRoles.label: Campaign groups output
outputRoles.description: Description of the campaign groups from LinkedIn Campaign Manager tool

outputRoles.name: campaign_dataset
outputRoles.label: Campaigns output
outputRoles.description: Description of the campaigns from LinkedIn Campaign Manager tool

outputRoles.name: creative_dataset
outputRoles.label: Creatives output
outputRoles.description: Description of the creatives from LinkedIn Campaign Manager tool

outputRoles.name: campaign_analytics_dataset
outputRoles.label: Campaigns' metrics
outputRoles.description: Metrics related to the campaigns from the LinkedIn Campaign Manager tool

outputRoles.name: creatives_analytics_dataset
outputRoles.label: Creatives' metrics
outputRoles.description: Metrics related to the creatives from the LinkedIn Campaign Manager tool

params.name: account_id
params.label: Account Id
params.description: Id of the sponsored account. You may find in on the LinkedIn Campaign Manager tool : https://www.linkedin.com/campaignmanager/accounts. To retrieve all the tables, the account should contain at least one campaign and one creative

params.name: batch_size
params.label: Batch size
params.description: Number of ids per batch query. A request should not return more than 1,000 entities (campaigns, creatives...). When the API raises a error 400 : Request would return too many entities, consider decreasing the batch size.
